title: Pyroscorian Skeleton
description: This charred skeleton radiates intense heat, remnants of its life in volcanic regions. It launches fire-based attacks, igniting its surroundings and any who dare approach.

title: Ratfolk Mercenary
description: This cunning Ratfolk mercenary is small but agile, equipped with light armor and dual daggers. Skilled in stealth and espionage, they are often hired for sabotage missions or as scouts in larger armies.

title: Sand Golem
description: A towering golem crafted from compacted sand, this entity is incredibly durable, with a natural resilience against physical blows. It lumbers slowly but hits with crushing force, proving to be a formidable guardian in desert ruins or ancient temples.

title: Undead Archer
description: Silent and deadly, undead archers strike from afar with precision and accuracy. Skeletal in form, they rain down arrows upon their enemies, maintaining distance while inflicting considerable damage.

title: Crocodile
description: This massive crocodile boasts thick scales and powerful jaws, capable of crushing armor and bone alike. It lurks in waterways, attacking swiftly with little warning, making it a deadly predator in its natural habitat.

title: Goblin Sorcerer
description: A small, cunning creature with a knack for magic, the Goblin Sorcerer uses a variety of spells to harass and confound its enemies. While physically weak, its magical versatility makes it a tricky opponent.

title: Fire Elemental
description: Composed entirely of roaring flames, the Fire Elemental emanates intense heat that can ignite its surroundings. It moves fluidly, attacking with fiery bursts that can engulf multiple targets at once.

title: Undead Tree
description: This twisted, animated tree is a terrifying sight, with gnarled branches and a hollow, moaning trunk. It's highly durable and can withstand significant damage, making it a stalwart defender of cursed forests.

title: Void Lizard
description: A sleek, dark lizard that seems to absorb light around it, the Void Lizard can manipulate shadows to conceal its presence. It attacks with surprising speed and precision, often catching its prey off guard.

title: Kobold Necromancer
description: A diminutive, reptilian spellcaster, this Kobold Necromancer specializes in the dark arts, summoning undead minions to do its bidding. Despite its low health, it can be a persistent threat if not dealt with quickly.

title: Zombie
description: Mindless and decaying, zombies are numerous and relentless in their pursuit of flesh. Though individually weak, their swarming attacks and poisonous bites can overwhelm the unprepared.

title: Lich
description: A powerful necromancer risen from the depths of darkness, the Lich commands formidable magical abilities. With spells of decay and death, it seeks to annihilate all who dare to oppose its unholy reign.
